publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2640.3 Chris Ballance: Nuclear Weapons—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2640) in the name of Roseanna Cunningham, insert after “£20 billion” “; notes that communities and the environment across Scotland are endangered by nuclear convoys, by the dismantling of nuclear submarines at Rosyth and the testing of depleted uranium shells at Dundrennan; furthermore calls on Her Majesty’s Government to honour its international obligations under the Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty,” Supported by: Mr Mark Ruskell*
